121.content:
Teresa sat at the window enjoying the nice summer breeze blowing through her hair. Out on a walk along the side road not to far from town to admire the house that has recently sold. The house was some what old but still in great shape. It was across the street with a sizable property an old empty work shop close by. The forest behind the house was part of the property as well giving the house a peaceful and nature like look to it. Teresa sat there wondering who might move in, and as if on Que a U-truck and trailer pulled into the lane. Teresa took this as an opportunity to meet her possible new friend(s). Teresa is a gorgeous girl who just turned 20 years old. She had stunning red hair that went to her solders that is usually tied up in a pony tail. Standing at 4'9" she was short and agile with a slim body and waist. Teresa didn't have any physical characteristics that caused her to stand out from other women, with small breast (B cup) and no curves it made her look kind of tomboyish. Normally wearing a tank top with shorts. She didn't care although always wounder what it would be like to curvier. This gave her a curious out look on life and had a positive attitude.
Approaching the house a young man who looked 21 years of age got out of the truck to begin unpacking. He stood about 5'10" with short black hair and looked rather athletic from what she could tell from the T-shirt and baggy jeans he was wearing. Teresa approached the him with his back turned.
"Hi there, my name is Teresa welcome to your new home" she said with a smile which caught the gentleman off his guard. He turned around facing Teresa. He eased into a smile
"Oh hi there. The name is Isaac nice to meet you." Offering her a hand shake.
Teresa went a different approach and gave him a hug instead catching him off guard again. "I do better hugs than hand shakes", she chuckled, taking a step back and saw how awkward that left him. "Sorry, I have a bit of enthusiastic life style."
Isaac laughed, " that's fine just not used to being approached like that from a stranger. Well I guess where not exactly strangers now are we."
Teresa laughed as well. "thanks for not making me feel awkward about that."
"No worries"
" I was just wondering who was going to move into a place like this. I mean when I go on walks I always wondered if the inside of the house was just as nice as the out side."
"Well if you got time and if its not weird I can give you a tour although it might not look as great without anything in it."
"Lead the way oh fearless leader" joked Teresa.
Isaac laughed again, "OK then I like your enthusiastic attitude already." Isaac opened up the front door of the house and began the tour and joked around about how empty the house was. "This place also has an attic that I haven't seen yet but your pobly..."
"sure lets go check it out" as she interrupted him. Isaac chuckled. "you sure like to laugh and joke around a lot."
"Ya it kind of fits the name I guess considering it means laughter" he replied. "anyway he tugged on a string on the ceiling that pulled down a set of steps that locked into position. Gesturing to them "after you Majesty"
"No no lady's first" she laughed
"K then see you up top." Isaac raced up the stars and Teresa followed.
There wasn't much room up once they got up there. The room was 4' wide and 6'long, it was a room that faced the back yard with a round window looking out. The strange part was a small table with a fancy wooden box.
"Huh I guess the previous owner must have forgotten this but it looks extremely old," Isaac seemed a bit confused.
"Come on open it there might be treasure inside" Teresa was just if not more curious of what was inside than Isaac.
"Sure I could use some good luck" as he opened it and inside was just made him more confused.
